origins.name: Academy
origins.desc:
The Academy sponsors 3 items each game.

Copies of sponsored items grant bonus max Health and Damage Amp. Academy units holding sponsored items gain double the amount, plus an additional 5% Health and Damage Amp.

origins.name: Emissary
origins.desc: This trait is active only when you have exactly 1 or 4 unique Emissaries.

origins.name: Black Rose
origins.desc: Each Black Rose champion's star level increases Sion's power.

origins.name: Chem-Baron
origins.desc:
Gain Shimmer after each player combat. If your loss streak is at least 3, gain more.

At each stack of 100 Shimmer, the Black Market offers you contraband that only Chem-Barons can use. Chem-Barons gain max Health for each Black Market you pass on.

origins.name: Experiment
origins.desc:
Gain Laboratory hexes on your board.

Combat start: Experiments standing on Laboratory hexes gain the Experiment bonuses of all Experiments on Laboratory hexes, plus max Health.

origins.name: Family
origins.desc: Family members support each other, reducing their max Mana and gaining extra bonuses.

origins.name: Automata
origins.desc: Automata gain a crystal when they deal damage. At 20 crystals, they blast their current target, dealing magic damage + 25% of damage dealt since the previous blast and reset. They also gain Armor and Magic Resist.

origins.name: Firelight
origins.desc: Every 6 seconds, Firelights dash. While dashing, they attack with infinite range and heal a percentage of the damage taken since their last dash.

origins.name: Rebel
origins.desc:
Rebels gain 15% max Health.

After your team loses 25% of their Health, a smoke signal appears, granting Rebels 60% Attack Speed for 5 seconds and extra power for the rest of combat.

origins.name: Scrap
origins.desc: Combat start: Components held by Scrap units temporarily turn into full items. Scrap units gain Shield for 24 seconds for each component held by your team, including those that make up a full item.

origins.name: Enforcer
origins.desc:
Combat Start: Enforcers gain Shield and Damage Amp. The highest Health enemy units become WANTED!

When a Wanted enemy dies, Enforcers gain 30% Attack Speed.

origins.name: Conqueror
origins.desc:
Conquerors' takedowns grant stacks of Conquest. After gaining enough Conquest, open War Chests full of loot!

Conquerors gain Attack Damage and Ability Power, increased by 5% for each War Chest opened.

classes.name: Ambusher
classes.desc: Damage from Ambushers' Abilities can critically strike. They also gain bonus Critical Strike Chance and Critical Strike Damage.

classes.name: Bruiser
classes.desc: Your team gains 100 max Health. Bruisers gain more.

classes.name: Quickstriker
classes.desc: Quickstrikers move faster and gain Attack Speed, based on their target's missing Health.

classes.name: Form Swapper
classes.desc:
Innate: Form Swappers change their stats and ability based on if they're placed in the front 2 rows or back 2 rows.

Frontline Form Swappers gain Durability. Backline Form Swappers gain Damage Amp.

classes.name: Dominator
classes.desc:
Combat start: Dominators gain a Shield for 15 seconds.

When Dominators cast, they gain stacking Ability Power based on the Mana spent.

classes.name: Visionary
classes.desc: Whenever Visionaries gain Mana, they gain more.

classes.name: Artillerist
classes.desc: Every 5 attacks, Artillerists launch a rocket that deals 125% Attack Damage around the target. They also gain Attack Damage.

classes.name: Pit Fighter
classes.desc: Pit Fighters gain 15% Omnivamp and deal bonus true damage. Once per combat at 50% Health, they heal a percentage of their max Health over 2 seconds.

classes.name: Sniper
classes.desc: Snipers deal more damage to targets farther away.

classes.name: Sorcerer
classes.desc: Your team gains 10 Ability Power. Sorcerers gain more.

classes.name: Sentinel
classes.desc: Your team gains Armor and Magic Resist. Sentinels gain triple.

classes.name: Watcher
classes.desc: Watchers gain Durability, increased while above 50% Health.
